content:
Hey guys,
I just figured out the build.fhir.org/diff.html doesn't talk about all the changes which are there for condition.category field. Here it just says "Max Cardinality changed from 1 to *". Actually the binding is also changed from preffered to example, and values are also changed. shouldn't it be present in changelog?
the diff analysis ignores changes in binding that aren't involving extensible and required
ohhh okay! that means for this I will have to go through all the changes manually if I am using any preferred valuesets.
